name: A sacrifice for the turquoise lord
name_original: A sacrifice for the turquoise lord
description:
My first unity project, made with a team of 5 over the course of 3 months.

You must venture deep in the temple of the turquoise lord... The Aztec god of time, solve riddles and overcome challenges to rescue your little sister!

Watch out, every room is more perilous than the last and a more challenging puzzle always awaits, good luck! 

There might still be some annoying bugs left that i didn't find, or didn't have time to fix, please be indulgent.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move your character around.

Use the spaceBar to use the item you currently have equipped.

Use  Tab to equip your next tool.

Thank you to my team: Aristide, Antonin, Javier, and Nicolas, for their support and their great sense of teamwork.
